translations: 以低于竞争者的价格出售；压价销售；贬损（undersell 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: It was a sport shockingly undersold to the public and Dassler had plans to address that.
sentences.translation: 足球是一个以极其低廉价的价格向公众出售的体育项目，达斯勒打算把它置诸掌中。

sentences.sentence: To tell you the truth, your father was right when he said that you undersold the company.
sentences.translation: 老实告诉你，你父亲对你低价抛售公司的判断是对的。

sentences.sentence: One of the undersold boons of the Internet is that it functions a bit like a permanent, rolling global coffee break.
sentences.translation: 互联网一个极大的恩赐就是，它就像一个永久的，流动不息的咖啡休息室。
